DEAD_RETURN_MSG_01:
́What are you doing, ȁ!?
Hurry up! The King's waiting on you. 
ā
I'll heal your team before you head out!
DEAD_RETURN_MSG_02:
̅Oh, ȁ! What went wrong out there!?
ā
Let's get your fellow monsters all healed
up and give it another go.
DEAD_RETURN_MSG_02_2:
̅Don't give up so easily this time.
Monster Masters should be more resilient!
DEAD_RETURN_MSG_03:
́What are you doing, ȁ!?
Hurry up! The King's waiting on you. 
ā
I'll heal your team before you head out!
CITY_RULER_01:
́A new Zoom Stone has been detected.
Attuning with the Zoom Stone for future access...
REC_POINT_NOC_05_02:
̄A celestial body that exists in the center of the world. 
There is no more data on it.
DEAD_RETURN_MSG_01_SPEED:
́Hmm... what happened, ȁ?
ā
You musn't keep his highness waiting.
Dust yourself off, and get a move on!
COMM_APPROACH_STATUE_SPEED:
̄Inspect the stone monument located near by in order
to unlock the Full Charge and Unify abilities.
NPC_RENERTE:
̂You got the Mirror of Ra. Great.
But…… Isn't it strange that Incarnii are Nochira?
ā
I mean there were already records that existed
when Incarnii first came to this planet
ā
So that's why I assumed that Nochora were
native to the Break World
ā
Maybe the Incarnii changed into
Nochora at some point.
MINE_00_MSG: Will you use the mobile device to visit the Silent Meadows?Ă
GIM_BOX_REC_01:
̄I'm detecting a form of life, from inside of the box.
Would you like to see what's inside?Ă
NPC_CHILD_A:
̂Wowzers! When you did transform?
Now you're a Nochora!
MINE_LADDER_MSG:
̄I am detecting a ladder within your vicinity.
ā
You will not be able to climb this ladder while riding 
atop one of your monsters.
ā
Before attempting to climb any ladders, always remember to
first dismount from the monster you are riding.
MINE_07_MSG_01: The Transporation Device is offline. You won't be able to use it at this time.
MINE_07_MSG_02: Use the Transportation Device to visit Spirit Road?Ă
NPC_NOCHO_BANK:
́You used that Ra device to make me
 normal again? I dun understand, but 's'okay!
ā
At least I can tell that reactor's
goin' 'gain!
DONT_USE_TRANSFER_010: The Transporation Device is offline. You won't be able to use it at this time.
CITY_RULER_01_2:
Centre Building - Entrance 
was added to the Zoom List.
CITY_RULER_02:
́A new Zoom Stone has been detected.
Attuning with the Zoom Stone for future access...
CITY_RULER_02_2:
Fallen City - Power Plant 
was added to the Zoom List.
COMM_RULER_POINT_MSG: ̄You've already attuned with this Zoom Stone.
INN_MSG_CITY_1ST_001:
́Welcome to the Inn! Here, weary travelers can rest
and recover.
ā
Consider this stay on the house!
Would you care to spend the night?Ă
DEMO_101_AFT_REC:
́I've heard that many Monster Masters used to 
dwell inside of this building.
ā
I'm fairly excited to see it, as I've only heard stories of it to date.
NPC_GOD_ACE:
́F'eh, you returned me to normal.
Fine. But……
ā
Why did I change to that form?
Neither Wulfspade, Ace or Wildcard……
ā
Did somethin' happen…? I don't remember.
Why am I suddenly feelin' so uneasy?
INN_MSG_CITY_1ST_002:
́Alrighty. Stop back here any time
you start to feel tired.
INN_MSG_CITY_1ST_003:
́I hope you slept well.
Stop back here any time you start to feel tired.
DEMO_100_AFT_NPC_A:
́Ya finally made it! Everyone's
already set out for the building to the north!
DEMO_100_AFT_NPC_NOCHORIN:
́Ace has informed us that the city's electrical grid
is no longer online. This door remains inoperable.
ā
We're going to need to turn the electricity back on if we wish
to open this door and get inside.
MSG_DRONE_ACE_020:
́You can give 'er a test flight to
figure out the controls and get some sweet items too!
ā
So I want you to get 10  Sky Powers 
which you can only get in tall places!
ā
You should press START from the
Reactor display to start the drone.
ā
You should be able to take items that
you find if you force your way through! Good luck!
NPC_GOD_ACE_REC:
̄The true form of the Nochora, Ace. His appearance
has not changed much, outside of his original color.
DEMO_101_AFT_NPC_B_1: ́The others have already ventured onwards. If you hurry, you can still catch up to them. They headed north.
DEMO_101_AFT_NPC_C: ́Hey, you! You showed up at the right time!
DEMO_101_AFT_BUT:
́Hmm... I'm not the best when it comes to working with
machinery. You'll need to talk to Ace about that.
ā
Meat is to a butcher as machinery is to Ace! He always knows what to do when it comes to machines!
DEMO_101_AFT_IMP_2:
́It looks like this road just leads to a dead-end. 
Part of the overhead roadway collapsed, and blocked it.
ā
You'll find everyone else, gathered over by the entrance to
the Centre Building.
DEMO_102_AFT_NPC_A:
̂Hey, ȁ! Ace and the others are waiting on you just up ahead.
ā
They're waiting over by the entrance to the big Centre Building we looked at earlier from the hill.
DEMO_101_AFT_ACC:
̂The King is looking for you! He seemed anxious to ask you for a favor.
ā
He's in the big building. Please go see him.
NPC_TICO_REC:
̄A member of the hard working Pipit tribe who
forges lucky armaments. He is no amateur.
DEMO_102_AFT_KNG:
̅You must proceed northeast along the road in order to
reach the Power Plant.
ā
I'm anticipating good news upon your return! Now, best of luck to you, Monster Master!
DEMO_102_AFT_JAC:
́If you follow the road in a clockwise direction from where we stand, you'll reach the Power Plant.
ā
I think it will be in your best interest, however, to first consider
heading for the Monolith in to northwest.
DEMO_102_AFT_ACE:
́Start by findin' that Stone Monolith to the Northwest
o' here, like his majesty was sayin' to ya.
ā
Just walk on up to that Monolith, and touch it. It's gonna help 
you learn some new Monster Master skills fer sure!
DEMO_102_AFT_QEN:
̂Ugh! I sure as heck don't wanna be out here all day in this sun! This hat just ain't gonna cut it out here in this heat!
ā
Not to mention this is gonna take a toll on my sugar pie! I sure hope we figure somethin' out soon...
DEMO_101_AFT_BNK:
́Well heck, we come all this way an' the door's locked! 
Well... this is just our luck, ain't it!
ā
It's just one thing after another. We sure can't catch a break... 
I hate it when this kinda stuff happens.
REC_POINT_NOC_03_02: ̄A power-generating facility. The people of this city depend on this to survive.
DEMO_101_AFT_NPC_A:
́Have you been keeping you eyes peeled for new monsters to recruit? Don't forget, you want to build a strong team!
ā
Keep training and scouting, and in no time you'll be on your way 
to becoming the best Monster Master this world's ever known!
DEMO_102_AFT_NPC_A_02:
̂If you follow the road ahead, you'll find the Power Plant.
ā
His highness is really counting on you, so please... be careful!
DEMO_102_AFT_NPC_ACC_00:
̂I heard there's a Stone Monolith around here somewhere that'll teach you an ability unique to Monster Masters.
ā
You need to go find it, especially since you can directly benefit from it, being a Monster Master and all!
DEMO_102_AFT_NPC_ACC:
̂You're headed over to the Power Plant? It's just east from here.
ā
If you keep following the road you should reach the Power Plant.
NPC_NOCHO_ACCE:
̂I've never seen so many meteors!
It's funny how they streak across the sky.
ACE_SPECIAL_MSG:
́Well, I'll be... you found the Monolith by the northwest gate! The Power Plant should be just east o' there.
ā
You best be careful, ȁ... The road's in pretty bad
shape round those parts... Make sure ya don't fall through!
GIM_BOX_REC_02: The monster in the container suddenly attacked!
NPC_MAN_A:
́What? Nochora's like one of those
things that transforms when it sees a meteor?
NPC_NOCHO_REACT:
́Maybe I'll turn into a frog next?
……Well, I kind of feel like one.
REC_POINT_DRONE_HOLE_02: ̄It looks hollow inside. You can check it out using the drone.
NPC_KING_REC: ̄The King of the Nochoro species. Due to his oversized body, he cannot move without the assistance of his subordinates.
NPC_QUEEN_REC: ̄The wife of the Nochoro King. She absolutely loves gaudy jewelry.
NPC_JACK_REC: ̄Servant to the Nochoro King. Manages the King's subjects as well.
NPC_MAN_REC:
̄Ordinary human male who recently was a from deep, 
cryogenically induced sleep, within the Core.
NPC_ACE_REC: ̄A Nochoro that loves tinkering with machines. He also wears a Reactor on his head.
NPC_NOCHO_MEN_REC:
̄A male of the Nochoro species.
They are quite curious and friendly in nature.
NPC_NOCHO_WOMEN_REC:
̄A female of the Nochoro species.
They are shy and quite cautious.
NPC_NOCHORIN_REC:
̄A male of the Nochoro species. It seems
to possess incredible speed for fleeing.
REC_POINT_NOC_01_02: ̄Man-made travel equipment to travel between the Lands. Connects to the Silent Meadows.
COMM_ABILITY_ACCESS_SPEED:
̄……Access check confirmed.
You will get the abilities, Ride Fuse & Full Charge.
REC_POINT_NOC_02_02: ̄A mechanical Disaster Prevention shutter. It would likely be operational if power were to be restored to the city.
REC_POINT_NOC_04_02:
̄A giant building resembling the former headquarters of the Monster Master Organization.ā
According to records, Carmasso is listed as the head of the organization.
REC_POINT_NOC_06_02:
̄Attuning to this Zoom Stone will add it to your destination list.
These stones appear in various places around the world.
REC_POINT_NOC_07_02: ̄This man-made transporter is connected to the Spirit Road.
NPC_NOCHO_MAHHA:
́What!? Is somethin' goin' on o'er
there 'cause Imma hearin' strange noises.
REC_POINT_NOC_08_02: ̄A stone monument that has recorded a special technology that exists for use by Monster Masters.
REC_POINT_NOC_09_02: ̄A device that will activate Masters Road for those who wish to improve their riding technique.
NPC_GB_BANK_REC:
̄Red is the hero's color! Young Incarnii who
train hard will turn red.
COMM_ABILITY_TALK_GATTAI:
̄Ride Fuse can be used in battle when
the player and partner are both riding monsters.
ā
The partner's monster will fuse with the player's
monster, strengthening it.
ā
There are special techs that can only be used by
monsters fused in battle. Try to find them all.
COMM_ABILITY_TALK_MANTAN:
̄Full Charge is a special ability that will quickly restore your monster team to full health.
ā
If you have multiple injured allies, use this ability to conveniently heal up before moving on.
MES_MIYABULIST_MES:
̄I noticed the strong Ra effect!
So it's a good idea to search this area.
ā
Confirm the Miyabulist by the button to the
lower-left when you press the Reactor Startup button.
MINE_KUMA_MSG:
A rock's pinned a Nochora's leg. Seems like
some strange power keeping it from moving.
MINE_TICO_MSG:
̂This place has a strong Ra reaction?
Maybe it's an Incarnus?
ā
Try pressing the button that looks like the Mirror
of Ra in the lower-left after pushing Reactor Startup!
ANALYZE_TICO_MSG:
̂No, don't look at me, press
the lower left button after pushing Reactor Startup.
MSG_DRONE_ACE_010:
́You should give the drone a test flight
before jetting to the next place, ȁ!
MSG_DRONE_ACE_030:
́Oh, I knew you could do it!
You got all 10 of those  Sky Powers !
ā
And a hang of the controls too.
I'm sure the drone'll come in handy next!
MES_SYSTEM_010: You shouldn't leave this area just yet.
MES_NEW_REACTER_MES:
̄Power of Ra installed!
Please start the Reactor.
ā
"Rasearch" will be displayed when the cursor
is over something that has a true form.
NPC_AROMA_010:
̂I'm stunned. So Nochora's true
form was that of the Incarnus……?
ā
……I'll leave it to you to reveal everyone's
true identity!
ā
Talk to me once you've done everybody, 'kay!
NPC_NOCHO_BOOK:
̂The view up here is really great!
Like something special is gonna occur!
NPC_TICO:
̂That Incarnus is…… Diamagon Ace.
But it still smells like Wulfspade Ace!
ā
I'm pleased that you found it…… But
was it under some sort of curse?
NPC_GB_INN:
́I dunno where I am……
Or how I got here……
ā
……I've completely lost my memory.
NPC_GB_BOOK:
̂What's this charming scene!? We WERE
on a dying planet before……
NPC_NOCHO_MEET:
́Maybe a new power of that reactor you
started? Transmogrification sounds pretty fun!
NPC_GB_MEET:
́Huh……? What am I doing?
Where have Jester and Wildcard gone?
NPC_NOCHO_ITEM:
́Return to original true form? 
I don't quite understand.
NPC_GB_B_REC:
̄It's faster than most Incarnii.
It'll be good at recon.
NPC_GB_ITEM:
́'Sup? What's going on?
The Insurgent Demons suddenly vanished?
NPC_GB_ACCE:
̂What the heck am I doing here?
Ungh…… My head……
NPC_NOCHO_B:
́That' show you came here too, right?
 Meteors're like amazing!
NPC_GB_B_010:
́Huh……?
ā
I thought I was about to
lose it all and scream……
NPC_GB_BANK:
́……What the heck?
Why is Diamagon Ace…… HERE!?
ā
That's the next form of Wildcard?
Did it devolve? No, I'm an idiot!
NPC_GB_REACT:
́I feel like it's been so long
since I've been myself. Like I've been locked away……?
NPC_GB_MAHHA_010:
́Where the heck is this? The Djinn's
shrine? Wait, no. Something strange has happened……
NPC_AROMA_REC:
̄A girl that was impersonating Lucia. She is a rather intelligent,
beautiful, young apprentice scientist.
NPC_RENATE_REC: ̄She was once Anses's main partner. Now she's the overseer of the underground Resistance lab for Anses clones.
REC_RA_DOOR_030: They don't appear to have any significance at this time...
NPC_GB_INN_REC:
̄An Incarnus that isn't the strongest, but
has no weakpoints. It is considered reliable.
NPC_GB_BOOK_REC:
̄Smarter than all other Incarnii,
It helps everyone with its great wisdom.
NPC_GB_MEET_REC:
̄It's more of a pig than others.
No joke! It fights better the fatter it gets.
NPC_GB_ITEM_REC:
̄A well-rounded support Incarnus.
It knows how to use items effectively.
NPC_GB_ACCE_REC:
̄The most average Incarnus of the bunch.
It is a mood-setter that likes to psych up allies.
NPC_GB_REACT_REC:
̄An Incarnus that was born to fight.
It's younger than most so it's battle prowess is low.
NPC_GB_MAHHA_REC:
̄The Nochoro, Chomach's true form.
A red Nochoro is the sign of God's chosen Nochora.
NPC_CHILD_REC:
̄Ordinary human child who recently was a from deep, 
cryogenically induced sleep, within the Core.
REC_POINT_KUMA_BEFORE:
̄ The Ra Function is reacting to the target very strongly!
Activate Ra Function to unmask target.
REC_RA_DOOR_011:
̄A door leading to another world. It was discovered
by in the Mirror of Ra's reflection, which shows the truth.
REC_RA_GB_BEFORE_010:
̄Check reaction to Ra.
It will reveal its true form when using power of Ra.
REC_RA_MONS_MES:
̄An Insurgent Demon transformed by Mother's
rampage. It has an frightening amount of power.
